StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetLodgingInfoBySchoolRowGuid]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode uniqueiden..er, @FiscalYear Integer
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT --May be needed for insert/update records along with schoolCode, though PointOfContactID should be used pc.PointOfContactID, CampusContactID AS LodgingInfoID, cp.[SCHOOL_CODE] AS SchoolCode, FiscalYear AS FiscalYear, pc.En.tyTitle AS LodgingName, [Street1], pc.[Street2],pc.[City],[State],[ZipCode], [TelephoneNumber], [FaxNumber], [EmailAddress], [Cost], pc.[CITY_CODE] AS CityCode, pc.[County_code] AS CountyCode, pc.[State_code] AS StateCode
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] pc INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].CampusContact cc ON cc.PointOfContactID = pc.PointOfContactID INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].CollegePro.le cp ON cc.CollegePro.leID = cp.CollegePro.leID INNER JOIN dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL hs ON hs.SCHOOL_CODE = cp.SCHOOL_CODE
WHERE hs.rowguid = @SchoolCode and cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear and pc.En.tyTypeID = 2
--ORDER BY cpr.[SCHOOL_CODE]
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
